channel.title: Help on Himachi...How do i use it?
channel.description:
Hello i have downloaded what i think is himachi, but umm... idk if it really is it.... and how do i use it, i put in the username and password for em but all it comes up to is a big list of like usernames...
so could you please help me :o :D :mad: :( :eek: ;)

item.title: Help on Himachi...How do i use it?
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

once you have it downloaded, open it up - turn power on (bottom, left side) - once the three green triangles are there, click on the triangle thing at bottom.

if you want to join a network, click join existing nextwork, the server advertisment should give you username and pass. some networks are full but the owner should have at least 1-10 networks. after that your connected to ham and ready to pop in the i.p. that’s given to you in moparscape 3.2 - and change port if needed (usually always default).

For creating a server with ham pm me.

(there’s my short version lol)

Read full topic
item.source: Help on Himachi...How do i use it?

item.title: Help on Himachi...How do i use it?
item.dc:creator: @hmni hmni
item.description:
@hmni wrote:

just to make sure
you dled from:
www.hamachi.cc ?
if so
if you registerd you should see a black box with stuff like power on and such… you click

IF YOUR CREATING NEW SERVER:
create new hamachi network
Pick A Name
Pick A Pass

IF YOUR JOINING SERVER:
Copy Name
Copy Pass

if this hasnt been enough please contact my aim or my msn

Read full topic
